A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Wow\, the new Star Wars film is pretty bad. What's worst of all is how divergent the tone and style are from the original trilogy and even the prequels which at least maintain the both scope of grandeur and the subtlety voice from the originals (which Rogue One did very well). 

The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi seem much more intent on TEACHING YOU A LESSON instead of telling you a good story. 

And beside tone and style\, it didn't make ANY sense and tried to substitute 'events' for 'plot.' 

I suspect the 'professional' reviewers who gave this film a thumbs up also gave the new Ghostbusters film a good review. 

F.
